title: Did Ricky Nelson actually do a version of 'Rhythm of the Rain'? - Quora

response.answer_text: He sure did. I think I remember him performing it. Ricky Nelson was huge prior to the Beatles, and you got to see him every Friday night (if memory serves me). At the end of Ozzie and Harriet, which everyone watched, he would perform a song. Nelson’s career would have been much more successful had it not been for the Beatles. He was absolutely my favorite until then.
